requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 TI 4GB / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: 32 bit systems are not officially supported

  • Additional Notes: 32 bit systems are not officially supported
